death: Your soul fades away into nothing, never to be seen again...
Ashes to ashes, dust to dust
You are untethered from your mortal bonds
You have been lost to the great unknown
retire: You decide to end your journey here at age %s and slowly meander back home popping in to anyone who helped you along your way and then happily retire in the place of your birth
win: ah well, here we go again
start: Let me draw your attention to this wonderful world that you find yourself in and show you around
Come in, come in, a whole world awaits (Fine print: a whole new world does not entail an entire world as you may understand it and so you may be dissapointed to find a lack of world in here)
welcome: You are in the %s, there is a secret to discover here
There are many secrets in the %s, enjoy your stay...
debt: You were mugged by the gangs that you are indebted to

places.name: deepest darkest pits of the dimension commonly refered to as hell

events.text: You come across a burning trading caravan at night, under attack from bandits, who are hidden by shadows

outcomes.name: Let it burn then steal all of the remaining goods
outcomes.output: A suvivor saw you steal the goods and you became less reputable

outcomes.name: Help the survivors, for a price...
outcomes.output: You get singed by the flames which smarts a bit but the leader of the trading caravan offers to give you some money and spread the words about your good deeds

outcomes.name: Help the survivors out of the goodness of your heart
outcomes.output: The leader of the trading caravan is slightly dismayed by your refusal for money but offers to spread the news of your good endeavors and help heal you of your stinging wounds

events.text: You come across a sheep stuck on the edge of a steep hill

outcomes.name: Attempt a rescue

true.output: You fall down the hill while trying to save the sheep. The sheep dies and you are left injured

false.output: You sucsessfully save the sheep and keep him as a pet

outcomes.name: Turn around and walk off
outcomes.output: The fellow sheep watch you walk away and charge at you

outcomes.name: Push the sheep to its death
outcomes.output: The are seen by the cobbler of a nearby town, you eat the mutton and lose 7 rep

events.text: You come across a weary traveler who asks for directions to the nearest town

outcomes.name: Direct him there
outcomes.output: He thanks you and gives you a bag of gold

outcomes.name: Mug him
Pretend to not be able to help
outcomes.output: The traveler wonders off into the distance with no purpose

events.text: You come across a trading caravan and start haggling with the owner
You find an enormous door to an old crypt, do you wish to enter?
You come across a skull with glowing red rubies for eyes

outcomes.name: Attempt to prise off the eyes
outcomes.output: You succeed with removing one of the eyes, however as you go to remove the second a cult who worships this statue jumps out of the darkness and stab you with spears letting you barely escape with the ruby and a gushing wound

outcomes.name: Kneel down before the statue in reverence
outcomes.output: Cult members leap out of the shadows and study you but then collectively decide to give you gifts and heal you. They wish you well on your travels and you continue onwards

outcomes.name: Attack the centre of the statue to remove both eyes at once

false.output: You catch the rubies as they fall but the statue splits in half, cult members hiding in the shadows collectively hiss as a huge lich appears, you flee and escape but not before taking a gushing wound at your side, impeding your escape greatly

events.text: You come across a brave merchant looking for exquisite wares and start an exchange
You find a bubbling pool of lava, with an abyss in the centre which tries to pull you in, do you wish to enter?
You find a spiraling staircase going ever upwards, do you ascend it?
You find the ghost of a dead merchant wandering the eternal plane of hell, offering the souls of the items he once sold
You come across a fire demon floating high above you, you do not think it has seen you but the dangers if it has are immense

outcomes.name: Assume it hasn't seen you and carry onwards
outcomes.output: It swoops down on you narrowly missing you but catching your gold purse, melting some of your gold and slightly burning you

outcomes.name: Fight the demon just in case

true.output: You defeat the abomination before it gets close, saving yourself

false.output: You get mauled by the creature before hiding in a nearby cave and cowering in fear and pain

events.text: You come across an inbread cat guarding a cave with treasure inside, an inbread cat, if correctly tamed can be a great pet and asset to your team

outcomes.name: Ignore it and carry on with your day
outcomes.output: The Inbread Cat ignored you and left you alone

outcomes.name: Attempt to tame the wild creature

true.output: You fail to tame the cat but in doing so defeat it, getting the treasure

false.output: You succesfully tame the cat with only a few scratches

events.text: You see a sandy trail heading down to a beach, do you follow the path
You come across a river, do you follow it upstream
You look out to the beach and see a swimmer in trouble

outcomes.name: Swim out to save him

true.output: You swam over and saved him, after he proceded to give you a bag of gold

outcomes.name: call for help

true.output: somebody heard your distress call and swam out to help

false.output: you call but nobody hears you

outcomes.name: walk of as if you didnt see

true.output: the swimmer managed to survive and he told everyone on the beach

false.output: you walk off and let the swimmer drown

events.text: You see a swimming lesson taking place, which reminds you that you never learnt how to swim

outcomes.name: Pay and learn how to swim

false.output: You went up to them but you couldn't afford the lesson so you walked off

outcomes.name: Walk past and carry on with your day

weapons.name: The Ban Hammer
weapons.loreData: The ultimate hammer, it stops the entity it reaches from ever having existed in the first place

weapons.name: blade literally made of rust
weapons.loreData: almost as if the rusty blade got even rustier than it already was...
